text.more: The example of a 2-mode network shown here comprises 84 nodes of the node type ‘tomb’ (green) and 270 nodes of the node type ‘persons’ (red). The nodes are related by edges, which represent the attestation of a person within a tomb's decoration. There are six tombs that doesn't show any edges, which means that the tomb owners remain anonymous. The node size helps to distinguish between the tomb owner, who is shown as a bigger node and other persons attested in the same tomb.
text.intro: 2-mode network of persons attested in Memphite Tomb Chapels dating to the New Kingdom
text.title: Memphite Tomb Network
